document.full_text: an avid twitter user's desire to help japan recover from the devastating march earthquake and tsunami has resulted in a charity e-book based on material gathered from around the world -- all within three days.
document.title: twitter brings world closer for japan quake charity e-book
lines_and_colors: an avid twitter user's desire to help japan recover from the devastating march earthquake and tsunami has resulted in a charity e-book based on material gathered from around the world -- all within three days.
